title: Nonvisual presentation of graphical user interfaces: contrasting two approaches
proctitle: CHI '94: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Elizabeth D. Mynatt
authors.institution: Graphics, Visualization and Usability Center, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, Georgia

authors.name: Gerhard Weber
authors.institution: Universitäe Stuttgart, Institut füe Informatik, and F.H. Papenmeier GmbH&Co, KG, Schwerte, Institut füe Informatik, Breitwiesenstr., 20-22, 70565 Stuttgart, F.R. Germany
